description: Hike or ride to top of ridge dividing Duffy from Stein following logging and old mining road. Note_ site also good for paragliding launch with south winds
directions: Drive in from Lillooet along, south along West Fraser Road to Texas Creek Forest  Service road. Starts 2wd, becomes 4wd as you turn up to Ochee Basin . Take right at fork and continue up steep, narrow valley to fork. Go right and follow to alpine meadow. Take winding road to ridge top if it is clear of snow and debris. Water bars may be washed out.
title: Molbdenite Ridge
